description:
We are proud of our large and diverse team at Rowe, Weinstein & Sohn, PLLC. Together, we defend the rights and best interests of our clients in Annandale, VA. Our law office handles both civil and criminal litigation across a wide geographical practice area. We also have offices in D.C. and Maryland.

The practice areas at our law office

Over the years, we have continued to expand our practice areas by growing our team. We now handle cases in these and other areas:

  • White collar crimes
  • DUI/DWI
  • Real estate
  • Personal injury
  • Family law
  • Workers' compensation

Why choose Rowe, Weinstein & Sohn, PLLC

Our award-winning team is big enough to have the resources we need and small enough to provide personalized services to our clients. We understand that each case is different and treat them accordingly. Consequently, when you choose our law office, you have a direct line of communication to the attorney handling your case.

This approach has made us one of the most trusted law offices in Virginia, D.C. and Maryland. It has also won us several awards. The National Academy of Personal Injury Attorneys named one of our lawyers a top 10 personal injury attorney. Similarly, The National Trial Lawyers organization named us among its top 100. Note that the initial consultation with our team is free.
